channel.title: Flash log in thing, it does work
channel.description:
For now the tutorial will be postponed as I will be going to Cincinnati tonight. but you can just test it yourself at [url=http://www.kloplop321.com/login/]http://www.kloplop321.com/login/[/url] I will edit in the source soon.
It does have image varification and this was a lot harder and easier than I thought, but anyway, just check it out. It works with MySQL because I find it much cleaner to use.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 04:17:01 PM[/size][hr]This is just in BETA, here is the source, so be don't be mental with it ;D

item.title: Flash log in thing, it does work
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

don’t fill up my database with crud plz.

11 kloplop321 Wednesday 04th of April 2007 04:54:31 PM b09875deecd05fc47feb1c1523b3b5c2 mailadmin@kloplop321.com 84445134 12.27.2**.***
12 penis Wednesday 04th of April 2007 06:23:37 PM 9268d0b2d17670598c70045b0c7abf38 peniscock@noob.com 16347204 203.118.1**.***
13 test Wednesday 04th of April 2007 06:30:05 PM 098f6bcd4621d373cade4e832627b4f6 test@test.com 63100181 12.27.2**.**
14 x Thursday 05th of April 2007 10:02:17 PM 9dd4e461268c8034f5c8564e155c67a6 x 16057837 220.240.1**.***
15 marluxia Thursday 05th of April 2007 11:16:32 PM 23b4222d2613a2765d4d432d2d65e88e zerorocket@hotmail.com 41042635 202.76.1**.***

cuz I got your Ip’s blocked out last 5 digits for privacy

I will soon put in a E-mail thing so people can’t just put in “x” I know it is just open right now, but I am too busy with other stuff.
